"Schraft": "They are new skills that are created by way of an \"N-Class Excube\" reaction."
"N-Class Excubes are acquired when you gain a great deal of experience."
"I'm not sure how the science works exactly, but I heard from someone that they're a crystallization of your inner Photons."
"If you want to reach even further heights, first start by visiting the Class Counter."
"You should be able to manage and create your Add-On Skills for all classes there."
